snippet: The Canadian freestyle skier Sarah Burke, a four-time X Games champion and 2014 Olympic favorite, was seriously injured during training in Utah.
abstract: Canadian freestyle skier Sarah Burke, a four-time X Games champion and 2014 Olympic favorite, is seriously injured during training in Utah.
lead_paragraph: The Canadian freestyle skier Sarah Burke, a four-time X Games champion and 2014 Olympic favorite, was seriously injured during training in Utah.

headline.seo: Canadian Freestyle Skier Sarah Burke Sustains Head Injury in Halfpipe Fall
headline.main: Freestyle Star Sustains Serious Head Injury in Training
headline.print_headline: Freestyle Star Sustains Serious Head Injury in Training
